alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 10 at 10:04PM EST until November 11 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla, Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides will run 2 to 3 feet above tide table predictions during the overnight high tide cycle, which will run from about 2 AM to 3 AM EST. Normally dry ground near the shoreline could experience up to 3 feet of inundation, leading to minor coastal flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
